name: Robotics Lab
description: the newest invention "native robot" was lost in the laboratories of labor technology. The new invention has intellect and senses, it is not large and can move independently. Engineers report that shortly before lunch, a quarrel broke out between the two scientists, which could have prompted the robot to escape. Ask scientists and find a robot

name: Machine Rise
description: At Innopolis University, we are registering more and more cases of equipment failure. The professors are worried that this might be the work of an evil ai. Investigate this case and find out if the machines really started the uprising.
